extendedInfo.description: Case White, the invasion of Poland 1939.This is a wargame, developed in html5/javascript and Cocoonjs. Please post comments.This game simulates the 1939 Axis invasion of Poland by Germany and their Slovakian allies. The game focuses on the Axis invasion, and does not cover the Soviet invasion.You can play against another player "hotseat" or else play either side against your device.Gameplay involves moving your units on a map of Poland. The map is organised into hexes to regulate movement. If you tap on a unit, hexes it can move to are highlighted in yellow. Tap on a highlighted hex to move there. If there is an enemy unit present, combat will occur.The units represent the military formations actually present in 1939. Mostly these are divisions, but some are brigades or army headquarters. You can place (stack) up to five units in a single hex. Tapping on the hex will rotate the units, with the selected one at the top.Copyright DK Simulations LtdArtwork by Gonzalo Santacruz de la TorreMap with permission from Poland Crushed by Schutze Games

reviews.title: HTC wildfire S error
reviews.comment: It seems to not open on htc wildfire s. I would love to play this. Please fix it, not for me but for many other people to play.
reviews.author: Reece Aspley

reviews.title: Got a bit better now
reviews.comment: Still work in progress but will be great once finished! Still not working properly on xperia P :-/. Although i can play it now, at last. Nevertheless it crushed and me saved game was gone :$ Touch controls are faster now and more responsive. Scrolling is better too!. Love ur games sir. This one i will uninstall for now as it is not quite there yet.
reviews.author: Jacob Klonowski

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: Love the format,  needs some work but great potential! Need a way to identity units without movement points- make them clear or dark?  Popup screens are too big or need an x in the corner to close them
reviews.author: andrew t

reviews.title: First game to completely crash my phone
reviews.comment: Red screen says loading and shows numbers from 1 to 32. Had to pull battery out UPDATE: with rev7 it just reboots the phone
reviews.author: Arturo Mart\303\255nez

reviews.title: needs work
reviews.comment: this game looks like it has a nice idea and look to the game. however when i start the game it starts and is swiftly followed by a force quit, this may just be my phone not being good enough or if the game needs refineing. thankyou
reviews.author: Robert Ashley
